评论详情: This is the best shirt.  The fit is great, the material is really soft.  I am 5’ 2”,  153 lbs and got a size M in the blue stripe. It fits perfect.  I also got the black stripe.  Very versatile, with jeans or dress pants.

When it arrives I loved ❤️ it was so soft and the fit was perfect.
Love this shirt. It’s very comfortable.

评论概述: Nice, but the cut could be better
评论详情: Fabric is decent, I like the color. Because it’s cotton (which was a positive in my decision process) it wrinkled that much more in the initial wash, but my handheld steamer did a good job of making it presentable.  Amazon suggested a Medium, but the Small fits fine. Even that is wide for me through the body. The armholes are cut quite deep, which I don’t like in general and makes fit under a jacket less than ideal. I’m keeping this blouse because I need it for a work trip but I wouldn’t buy another, even though I appreciate the color selections.
The fit and color were perfect. I got black and white stripe to wear with black jeans. Very comfortable and classy too .
Nice shirt but sizes didn’t fit Ordered 3 sizes & they just were cut differently than my other clothes
A nice 100% cotton shirt, the it runs a little small; ordered size M following the Size Chart, tight on the bust. Overall it’s a good shirt.
The fabric is soft and silky and the color is true. The fit is large (mine was M). The shirt is quite long. After washing, the shirt only needed light pressing.

I love this color and weight of cotton oxford cloth. A bit lighter than say, a men’s shirt, but nice.  Easily tuckable or wear over a tank.  I was attracted to the classic styling.  So far, it’s washed up well without too many wrinkles!

类型: Size: X-SmallColor: Ac Black and White Striped
评论详情: The material was really crisp, and the stripe print was nice however it was really oversized and long and didn’t have much shape to it

Exceptional quality, not easily wrinkled and so much fun to wear different ways. I was looking for the classic old money look when buying this shirt and this garment delivered the quality I was hoping for but you don't always find on Amazon. I get compliments every time I wear this. The largest size easily does up without pulling over my size 16 (38 DDD) chest. Don't hesitate to buy this shirt!

类型: Size: LargeColor: A Deep Gray Striped
评论详情: I love the style, however the claim is100% Cotton. Don't understand why the directions would say, do not dry clean. It doesn't feel like cotton.

Love this shirt for its classic look and great color.  Looks cool with pearls! Only problem is how wrinkled it came. I hate to iron, and unfortunately,  this shirt will require me getting out the ironing board.Also, I wish the collar had the the little buttons because I don't like floppy collars.

I purchased the blue and white striped size small. I’m 5’5 140. Fits perfect. Even has some stretch which is a must. I rarely give reviews.  100% cotton!!  I will wash it first to soften it but no dryer as I don’t want it to shrink.
Well made shirt with good material . Ran smaller in shoulder area so I wore it over a tank top. It was a very good long length. Wish it had a pocket.

Very soft loose fitting
Love this shirt. Great quality.
Reviews said ran LG, size down, but I  shouldn't have, too tight. Might have to sz up

I liked this shirt with black stripes ( medium was a little bigger than expected but okay to wear)….this red striped shirt was snug and would be too tight when washed.  Great color and quality shirt though.  Don’t know why the sizing is different but glad I got to keep one.
Very summery color and the material is lightweight and breathable. It has a very beautiful design and you van combine it with different outfits.

This shirt is decently nice. The color is as pictured. It is cotton, although it says not to put it in the dryer. I ordered my usual size and it just fits. I wouldn't want it to shrink, so I have hung it to dry for fear the dryer will shrink it. I wouldn't say this runs small, but it is a find of fitted button down. If you are hoping for something baggy, then you might size up. My usual size is definitely more fitted on me than the pictures of the shirt on the model online. So, if you want it to fit like the online pictures, I would say size up.

I like how light and breathable it is but it's too sheer, I thought it would be more opaque and have more texture but it's very smooth. Otherwise, a very nice slick shirt that can be worn every day, stretchy and breathable.

评论概述: Nice Casual Friday or Weekend Blouse
评论详情: The pink pinstripe is pretty. It’s loose and comfortable as describe. I would have liked to be a little more fitted to emphasize shape. It’s a nice blouse for jeans or in summer with shorts and for work. I like that it’s machine washable. You could also wear this unbuttoned with a tank top for a casual look.
A very nice shirt. Feels high quality and holds its shape well after a wash. Nice collar with an adjustable button. Looks really neat and flattering.

评论概述: Bright and cheerful, relaxed fit, 100% cotton
评论详情: This is a classic button-down blouse in bright yellow with white vertical stripes. The color makes it so cute and cheerful. The color is as shown in the seller's photos; it's a good deep/bright yellow, not pale, not too orange, not too green. I like the vertical stripes as they are somewhat slimming. I also like the relaxed fit. This shirt has a generous cut but isn't huge. I recommend ordering a size down if you want it more fitted. I have a 44-inch bust so I ordered a size L based on the size chart, and there's plenty of wiggle room and definitely a relaxed fit. The fabric is 100% cotton, and did shrink a little in the wash, so the generous fit helped out in that department. The fabric is smooth cotton sheeting that crisps up nicely when ironed with a bit or starch, or is softer without starch.  This blouse has a shirttail hem that is a bit longer in the back than in the front, and curves up somewhat on the sides. It is plenty long enough to tuck in, and also looks nice and slouchy when worn out. You could also tie it at the waist since the shirttails have plenty of length. You can roll the cuffs up as shown, or wear them down and buttoned. It looks cute with black jeans as shown in the seller's photos, and I also like it with blue jeans. You could dress it up with nice slacks and wear it to work.  Overall, this blouse has classic button-down styling, a generous, comfortable cut, is in cheerful yellow and I love the lightweight cotton sheeting. It's a great basic in a fun color.

I wanted to love this shirt - the yellow is fun for a classic shirt but the material is awful - definitely polyester or other non breathable fabric that feels like plastic and has a shiny coating. It looks and feels cheap and is scratchy against your skin. I would not recommend this shirt.

This yellow shirt just makes me happy. My 80 year old mother's favorite color is yellow and I ordered this for her. If I had to attach an emotion to this color, it would be "happy". I love that this shirt can be dressed up or down, it's just as at home in the grocery store with jeans as it is in the boardroom with a jacket (or without). The cotton is soft and cool. It's a great weight of fabric for the Arkansas transition from summer to winter, which can last from Sept till Jan! She washed it in cold water and dried it on low till damp. It came out wrinkled, but looked good as new with a light ironing and there was no shrinkage. The sizing was good, I ordered her normal size and it fits but is loose enough to layer a t-shirt under if she wants.

Seems to be a rarity to find natural fabrics anymore. Color is bold. Fit is loose but I ordered a size up to wear as an overblouse. Machine washed and dried. No noticeable fading or shrinking. There is a slight amount of wrinkling but, hey, it’s cotton. Doesn’t bother me but if you like a smoother look you’ll have to give it a quick ironing.

Have this dress shirt for my wife's use - love her using it around the house or in place of PJs. The color (yellow) is vibrant and fun, and the cotton has a soft feel that makes it a very natural feel. Sizing was accurate. The collar is very soft and has no stiff stays, so it's very natural fit along the colar.

She has these in so many colors the stripes is a fantastic wardrobe staple! The fabric is soft and breathable, making it perfect for all-day wear. The classic pinstripe design adds a touch of sophistication, while the long sleeves and collared style are ideal for office work or a polished look. It’s both stylish and versatile, easily pairing with jeans or dress pants. A great choice for a chic, professional appearance! They live in colder weather areas and this is super nice for those days as well as summer days

The Aoudery Womens Button Down, Striped, Long Sleeve Collared Shirt is so pretty in pink!  At first I thought the shirt sizing was incorrect, but in the picture, it appears oversized on the model: long, loose fitting , with the arm seam off the shoulder—it’s the style.  In that case, it fits as designed.  The shirt is made of thin cotton, nicely constructed.  I laundered it in cool water and dried on medium heat for about 25 minutes with. No noticeable shrinkage.  Since it is all-cotton, some wrinkles are to be expected.  These should iron out with a light steam pressing.  A classic, cotton pinstripe in beautiful colors and style.  Cute as shown with jeans, with or without layering.  It’s very cute with the sleeves rolled up.  A wardrobe classic!

This cotton button-down shirt is a great quality! I love to wear shorts like this in the winter because I can layer and almost wear this as a jacket, and then take it off if I get too warm. The color is gorgeous and it's a very nice looking shirt. Looks stunning on!

The sizing on this shirt is true US sizing not Asian. You need not size up. Because of the high cotton content it may shrink if put in the dryer (I haven't laundered it yet) so the fact that it is actually generous in cut will probably make it Goldilocks just right after washing it! It is too long in the sleeves on my short arms but that is my "normal".I will cuff or push them up anyway.I actually smiled when I unpacked the shirt. The sunny white and yellow stripes and the crisp  appearance are pleasing but it was other details that caused the upturn of my mouth. This is NOT shrink wrapped!  Instead it is in a plastic sleeve with a bit of tissue paper and plastic shirt clips holding all in place. It has an extra button attached to the label that lists the care instructions.I felt such nostalgia for the times that presentation and customer service were values to be counted on. Aoudery can count on me to be a repeat customer (actually I already have been!) because of this attention to providing good merchandise and a good experience for the buyer.Good job!

I received the yellow shirt free to try as part of the Vine Program. It isn’t my normal style but looked nice in the picture, so thought I’d give it a try. I am a 36DD so I ordered a large since many button up shirts do not fit around my bust. This shirt was more than enough room. In fact, it was TOO big. It looked frumpy and gave me absolutely no shape. I would definitely advise buying your normal size since this runs relaxed fit. The yellow is kind of a hard, striking color. Just not something I like or can pull off lol the material feels okay/a little stiff for my liking.  The shirt is okay but I am very particular when it comes to dress shirts.

It’s a beautiful color. But I would recommend sizing down. I ordered my regular size and it feels really oversized. The arms don’t hit where my arm pit is. It also seems a little see-through and there are some threads hanging off the button holes.  If you like an oversized fit you should be fine. But if you like it more fitted, definitely size down.

评论概述: Great Shirt for Work or Play
评论详情: My pink pinstripe Women's Button Down Cotton Striped Shirt is well-made and true to size. It looks great whether tucked in, buttoned, or layered. A versatile addition to my wardrobe!

This blouse is crisp and cool.  I wore it with the sleeves rolled up and half tucked in.  I washed it on a gentle cycle and hung it to dry since it is 100% cotton. There was no shrinkage. Fit is true to size.

This oversized pin striped top is so comfy and cute....very relaxed. I got it in bright yellow with pin stripes and it's so cheerful. I wore it to "Meet The Teacher" night, and it was the perfect choice.  It goes great with skinny jeans and leggings, and it covers the booty. The sleeves can be rolled up or worn long and buttoned at the wrist. I rolled them all the way up to my elbows...it was a SUPER hot night.  It's 100% cotton so there's probably gonna be a bit of shrinkage, and that's ok imo. It's also gonna get softer after every wash and end up being my fave shirt. I love it.

This button up is exactly as it looks in the photos. The stitching on it looks solid. The material feels a bit stiff. I picked the shirts because it’s 100% cotton, but the material feels very thin and not as sturdy as I wanted. The material does have stretch to it. The color is light and feminine, and the stripes are a closet stable.

As a taller girlie, with longer arms, I wish I'd ordered an x-large just so the sleeves would be longer. Also, the material is on the thinner side. Wearing it as a layered shirt is ideal.  The stitching and the buttons all look good. After several washes, the color held up really well. Most importantly, I didn't experience any shrinkage. The price is a little high, for the quality of the material. 4 out of 5.
This is an impressive, well made and versatile striped shirt.  It's light weight, so it's perfect for virtually any time of year.  Fits correctly to size.  Recommended.

I am re-building my office wear wardrobe. This shirt is a great addition. I am 5'6", there is plenty of shirt tail to tuck in if you are taller. The sleeve length hits my wrists just right. I often have to size up in this style shirt to avoid bust gapping, but that isn't a problem with this shirt. It's nice to have this style shirt that fits everywhere.
